definitions.title: n.pr.loc.
definitions.body: (perh. haunt of foxes; Ar. 3a9labun, As. šêlibu, fox);—in (orig.) territory of Dan, Ju Jdg 1:35 (cf. GFM, on etym. and site), 1Ki 4:9, Qalabeein, Salabeim, Ju also ai( a)lw/pekev, as doublet, or (A LXXL) alone; = [[שַׁעֲלַבִּין]] Jos 19:42, Sa(a)labein.
